post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
Good Day,
I am sending you a job description as I feel it may line up with you skills.
Please call Dawn at 905-283-1353 if you are interested or please just respond to this email.
If this opportunity does not match what you are looking for please feel free to forward to any friends you know who are looking for work.
Thanks,
Dawn
TEKsystems client located in the west end of the GTA has an immediate need for a J2EE Front End Developer. The application the qualified technical professional will be working on tracks invoices, billing and reporting of invoices. The client is doing a redesign of the application to upgrade it. There are 6 people on the team and they need more help on the front end and middle tier development.
Must Haves:
- Extensive experience with Java, Struts, Tiles, JSP, Spring, and JDBC
- Experience with AJAX, HTML, DHTML and CSS
- Working knowledge of JavaScript frameworks (jQuery)
- Working knowledge of using Oracle
---------------------
Dawn Badiuk TECHNICAL RECRUITER 350 Burnhamthorpe Road West, Suite 700, Mississauga, Ontario, L5B 3J1 800.254.0778 905.283.1353 WWW.TEKSYSTEMS.CA
post.title: J2EE Front End Developer
